structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Bonds Of Executors, Administrators, Guardians, Conservators, Trustees And Receivers

law.text: If the sureties or the penal sum in a probate bond are insufficient, the supreme judicial court or the probate court may, after notice to the principal in such bond, require a new bond with such surety or sureties and in such penal sum as the court orders.
